item.description:
Welcome to the Providence Collective Monday Meetup series! This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and event scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Camille's - in Historic Federal Hill!

Camille's on Federal Hill is a classic. Renowned for its location (make a left under the pineapple arch on Atwells Ave.) and fabulous Italian cuisine, its a Federal Hill icon. The main dining room is pretty formal, but there is also a lovely patio terrace called the Roman Garden in the back that offers beautiful al fresco dining in a casual, relaxed atmosphere. The Roman Garden also has a large lounge area for mingling and chatting the evening away, but we wouldn't know anything about that, would we.....?

This one got rained out a few weeks ago, so we're going to try again and they will be making a few pizzas for us to sample as well!

Click on the Gallery section and select Lounge/Patio at the lower left to see pictures:

http://www.camillesonthehill.com/

So if you haven't been, where better to spend a warm summer evening than in the Roman Garden patio at Camille's socializing with friends.

This one is worth knowing about, so let's check it out!

Hope to see you there! Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a bright blue, gradated-dyed scarf, but we're hard to miss!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Camille's!
